title: Warwick Thoughts
body:
Hi Everyone, 
I am happy with Riot's recent nerf's to Warwick because he was super strong before.
However now when I play him, I feel like he is a real underdog in the jungle.
After playing him all day the last couple of days, I have began to realize why. I feel like WW is only any good if you are chasing down an already hurt opponent or you have your ulti up. If there is a team fight or you are trying to defend tower, you are just to weak.

I have thought about how to fix this and I think his Q needs to be changed. I don't think WW needs the life steal ability, because he attacks quick and can regain life with a life steal item. I would like to see his Q replaced with maybe a stun or a knock up, this will make him more viable in team fights or under tower :)

Whats everyone elses thoughts?

replies.body: Warwick is already getting reworked at a "sion level". no need to ask Riot for it. its happening, but will take a long time.

I see no reason in doing so, the concept of Warwick is that he is good at picking in the jungle when the enemy tries to roam, in exchange for the weakness in team fights, so i think nothing needs to be done. If you are finding it not as strong as before, its probably that rito hasn't nerf the metas enough.
Just build Ravenous Hydra and be a trolly Warwick who kills the wrong person with his ult.
Wow, it's like there's counterplay to him or something wtf
